top_categories.workout_context: At mile 60 of 100, glycogen is gone. This workout teaches your body to produce watts on fumes.
Lake Taupo Cycle Challenge's lake Taupo gravel rewards steady threshold power. Surging and recovering costs more watts than just holding.
Lake Taupo Cycle Challenge's Lake Taupo, New Zealand gravel forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 100 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Lake Taupo Cycle Challenge's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before November.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Lake Taupo Cycle Challenge. Train it until it feels boring.
At Lake Taupo Cycle Challenge, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
When someone attacks on lake Taupo gravel, you have 10 seconds to respond or you're off the back. This builds that response.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Lake Taupo Cycle Challenge, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
100 miles rewards fat oxidation. This volume work shifts your fuel mix so you're still burning fat at hour 5, not bonking at hour 3.
Every hard session works better with a bigger aerobic base. At 100 miles, base fitness is the difference between racing and surviving.
Endurance with intensity spikes baked in. Exactly what 4,000ft of climbing on lake Taupo gravel does to your power file on race day.
Short, max efforts are unavoidable. Punchy climbs, gap closures, attacks on lake Taupo gravel. If you haven't trained them, you'll crack.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 60–80g carbs/hour for Lake Taupo Cycle Challenge’s 100 miles. Start fueling within the first 30 minutes — early fueling prevents late-race collapse. Bonking at mile 60 is a nutrition failure, not a fitness failure.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Lake Taupo Cycle Challenge requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on lake taupo gravel to build confidence. Expect: lake taupo, new zealand gravel, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Durability, TT Threshold, and Gravel Specific to prepare you for 100 miles of lake taupo gravel in Lake Taupo, New Zealand.
